name: ROLLGUE
description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NHmn2eYpVXY

Made for the #7DRL (7-Day Roguelike) Challenge, Rollgue is hybrid turn-based Roguelike and Action-Physics game.

This demo is a complete first level with two dozen rooms, 6 enemy types and a monstrous final boss!

We're considering expanding this into a full game, so you'd like to see that happen, tweet at us at @AntonHand and @RUSTLTD and share the dicey madness with your friends!

Also, just added payment info, do you can donate to the game's development if you'd like!

www.rustltd.com

Change Log

v1.01

- Fixed PlayerPrefs so that Graphics Quality Settings are now retained/set correctly.

RUST LTD.

Built using: Unity 5, Alloy 3, Sonic Ether's Bloom and SSAO

Music: Zefz
